action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Belch Fire {@recharge 4}
entries: The stove belches fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
